heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment 

Scheme Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.

text_raw:

In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Mother and Baby Institutions 

Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No. 20 of 2023).

title: 1(2) of the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No. 20 of
heading: 4. The 20th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Act of
text_raw:
4. The 20th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Act of 
2023 (other than sections 41 and 42), insofar as it is not already in operation, 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 February, 2024. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [67] 3
